A rental-purchase agreement that complies with this subtitle may not be deemed to be:
A "retail sale", as defined in § 12-601(s) of this title;
An "installment sale agreement", as defined in § 12-601(m) of this title; or
A "security interest", as defined in § 1-201(37) of this article.

This subtitle does not apply to:
A rental-purchase agreement made primarily for business, commercial, or agricultural purposes, or made with governmental agencies, instrumentalities, or organizations;
A rental of a safe deposit box;
A lease or bailment of personal property that:
Is incidental to the rental of real property; and
Provides that the consumer has no option to purchase the rented real property; or
A lease of an automobile.
